title: What was the Razakar period like in pre-independent Hyderabad and what were the brutalities that the people had to go through? Could we find books about this topic? - Quora

response.answer_text: I am not aware of a full length book in English or Telugu about the atrocities of Razakars but there are accounts by activists and poets (Dasarathi, Kaloji). There are two books criticising the Indian government for its action liberating Hyderabad one by A,G.Noorani and another by Nizam’s prime minster (Mirza Ismael if my memory serves me right).
